name: The Last Great Chrysanthemum
description:
The Last Great Chrysanthemum! The story of a Buddhist monk who is sent by the Buddha himself to gather the sacred flowers which were stolen by the demons of the mortal realm. But this journey will not be easy as China is in the midst of a civil war and the Japanese are invading through the north. By fighting through demons, soldiers, tigers, and dragons you can find the flowers hidden throughout the world. 

Go west young monk! Be guided by the monks to the hidden temples and defeat the evil to regain the light in the name of the Buddha! Will you be able to travel to that Great Empire in Japan and collect what the Buddha has asked you too? 

This game works best in Google Chrome.
